Value: Homonculi are strange beings created by a high level wizard who has somehow combined the properties of certain spells with parts of various demons. They are, therefore, a type of golem. These creatures are often set to guard areas, using their ability to fly to patrol corridors.
Since it casts powerful spells, it's best to use spell guard, reflection or absorption.
Wizard's Fire, Free Action, Toxic Cloud, Chameleon.
